title: fps capped at 60
body: I dont know why, but i have 60 fps capped with vSycn OFF and game DVR OFF and in game settings i have it UNCAPPED. What can i do about that? my framerates drops really low in teamfights and usually i have 100 fps.

replies.body: If your PC specs are [really good](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs), you may actually need to cap your framerate to smooth things out.  Try out our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide as well in case of settings or drivers that need some adjustments.
